articles.description: Sofia Richie supported her friend Olivia Jade after she shared a short clip of her Red Table Talk appearance. The message angered other users, who claimed it was an example of 'white privilege.'
articles.content:
Sofia Richie made it clear she still supports her friend Olivia Jade Giannulli  following a contentious conversation on Jada Pinkett Smith's Red Table Talk on Tuesday.
After Oliva Jade shared a snip… [+4314 chars]

articles.title: Christopher Nolan is Right About This Much in the WB and HBO Max Deal… - Den of Geek
articles.description: We examine where Christopher Nolan might have a point about the Warner Bros./HBO Max deal.
articles.content: The immediate reaction for manyif on social media and less in the industryhas been equivalent to a daylong eye roll. After all, Nolan was the filmmaker who pressured the same studio to release Tenet … [+1441 chars]

articles.title: The Mandalorian: Is Mace Windu the Jedi Who Will Find Grogu? - Den of Geek
articles.description: Is Mace Windu the Jedi who heard Grogu's call on Tython? Here's how the legendary Jedi Master could return on The Mandalorian.
articles.content: First of all, this is all speculative. The ultimate internet-breakage for a fan artist is for your work to get a wide enough audience that people start writing articles about it. But, on the other ha… [+1996 chars]
